exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ¦œã€€ã€€å•  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
title = [
    'æ’è¡Œ',
    'æ›´æ–°'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
orderby = [
    '/rank/',
    '/update/{{page}}/'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.4, false));
}
title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ ‡ã€€ã€€ç­¾  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/search/';
var list = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url)).select('.filter-item.clearfix')[2].select('li');
OO = `{{get('oo',Get('o'))}}`;
PP = `{{get('pp',Get('p'))}}`;
QQ = `{{get('qq',Get('q'))}}`;
RR = `{{get('rr',Get('r'))}}`;
SS = `{{get('ss',Get('s'))}}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = i;
    var kind1 = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/list\//, '-').replace(/\/$/, '').replace(/^\-$/, '');
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/list/${OO}${PP}${kind1}${SS}${QQ}${RR}{{page}}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('ä»£ç†ï¼š').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

var User = '';

var Intro = '';

var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list =  java.getElements('.itemBox||.list-comic');
    for (i in list) {
        name = list[i].select('.title, .txtA').text();
        author = list[i].select('.txtItme')[0] ? list[i].select('.txtItme')[0].text() : '';
        kind = String(list[i].select('.pd').text()).replace(/\|/g, ',');
        cache.put('gfkind' + list[i].select('.title').attr('href'), kind);
        latest = String(list[i].select('.coll, .info').text() + 'ã€”' + list[i].select('.date').text() + 'ã€•').replace(/ã€”ã€•/, '');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].select('mip-img').attr('src'),
            'url': list[i].select('.title, .txtA').attr('href')
        });
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes("/rank/")) {
        Data();
    } else {
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/\/(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return '/' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.itemBox, .list-comic')[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>
